amendment.description: Amendment to the Lowey amendment (A021) sought to limit the restrictions against making crop deficiency payments to persons who derive off-farm income in excess of $100,000 to those persons who reside in an incorporated municipality with a population that exceeds 50,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Lowey amendment to limit the restrictions against making crop deficiency payments to persons who derive a non-farm income in excess of $100,000 to those persons who reside in an incorporated municipality with a population that exceeds 50,000.

action.text: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Minge to the Lowey amendment (A021).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Minge amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
